alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 26 at 4:33PM EST until further notice by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Michigan... River Raisin At Monroe City affecting Monroe County. For the River Raisin...including Tecumseh, Adrian, Blissfield, Dundee, Monroe City...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...River Raisin at Monroe City. * WHEN...Until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM EST Friday the stage was 9.8 feet and near steady. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=DTX. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1245 AM EST.
